      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void findPostion​()
      This method moves the robot's sensor a bit in front of the origin so that the car can start rotating
      void localize​()
      This method localizes the robot using the light sensor to precisely move to the right location

      the overload method of localize() which will let the car do the localization near the target point
